parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: Default values are not set.
parameters.name: skip_default

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller with reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: UUID of the object to fetch
parameters.name: uuid

parameters.description: Required if the metrics need to be aggregated across multiple entities like virtualservice.
parameters.name: aggregate_entity

parameters.description: Aggregate metrics for all the records for obj_id. When this is set obj_id is treated as a filter rather than a dimension. Field introduced in 17.2.1.
parameters.name: aggregate_obj_id

parameters.description: Autonomous System number. Eg. asn=3794.
parameters.name: asn

parameters.description: Dos Attack ID filter.
parameters.name: attack

parameters.description: Browser filter. Eg. browser=Chrome.
parameters.name: browser

parameters.description: Client Insights Source Type - Active or Passive. Enum options - NO_INSIGHTS, PASSIVE, ACTIVE.
parameters.name: client_insights

parameters.description: Two letter country filter. Eg. country=US.
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: Detailed header returns metric information, statistics etc. It is has overhead which can be bypassed if caller just wants raw data.
parameters.name: detailed_header

parameters.description: Device type filter. Eg. devtype=desktop.
parameters.name: devtype

parameters.description: Aggregations for dimensions. Eg. use dimenstion_aggregation=avg for averaged metric values. Enum options - METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_NONE, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_AVG, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_SUM, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_MAX, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_MIN, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_PERCENT, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_ALL.
parameters.name: dimension_aggregation

parameters.description: Filters the obj_id based on the filter specified. Enum options - METRICS_FILTER_EQUALS, METRICS_FILTER_LIKE, METRICS_FILTER_CONTAINS, METRICS_FILTER_NOT_EQUALS.
parameters.name: dimension_filter_op

parameters.description: Limit the number of dimensions in the result. specially useful in case of URLs.
parameters.name: dimension_limit

parameters.description: Deprecated. perform sampling for dimensional metrics. zero means auto.
parameters.name: dimension_sampling

parameters.description: Group by dimensions for the metrics. Eg. For results by single dimension use dimensions=browser. For results by browser and operating system use dimensions=browser,os. Enum options - METRICS_DIMENSION_METRIC_TIMESTAMP, METRICS_DIMENSION_COUNTRY, METRICS_DIMENSION_OS, METRICS_DIMENSION_URL, METRICS_DIMENSION_DEVTYPE, METRICS_DIMENSION_LANG, METRICS_DIMENSION_BROWSER, METRICS_DIMENSION_IPGROUP, METRICS_DIMENSION_ATTACK, METRICS_DIMENSION_ASN.
parameters.name: dimensions

parameters.description: UUID of the entity. Eg. entity_uuid=virtualservice-0-1.
parameters.name: entity_uuid

parameters.description: ID of the request. In case of GET API it is returned in the metrics query response. In case of collections API responses are grouped byresponses corresponding to each optimized query.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Resolve UUID to names.
parameters.name: include_refs

parameters.description: Include metrics statistics with the request.
parameters.name: include_statistics

parameters.description: IPGROUP filter Eg. UUID of the IP group.
parameters.name: ipgroup

parameters.description: Language filter. Eg. lang=english.
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Max number of metric samples per metric requestedEg. limit=100 implies return only 100 samples.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Describes the entity type for which metrics is requested. Eg. &metric_entity=VSERVER_METRICS_ENTITY. Enum options - VSERVER_METRICS_ENTITY, VM_METRICS_ENTITY, SE_METRICS_ENTITY, CONTROLLER_METRICS_ENTITY, APPLICATION_METRICS_ENTITY, TENANT_METRICS_ENTITY, POOL_METRICS_ENTITY.
parameters.name: metric_entity

parameters.description: Comma separated list of metrics requested.Eg. metric_id=l4_client.avg_bandwidth,l7_client.avg_total_responses.
parameters.name: metric_id

parameters.description: number of levels of microservices map.
parameters.name: microservice_levels

parameters.description: serverip port of the pool server.
parameters.name: obj_id

parameters.description: Order metrics series by metric timestamp. -metric_timestamp will result in most recent value first in the time series.
parameters.name: order_by

parameters.description: Operating system filter. Eg. os=mac.
parameters.name: os

parameters.description: Pad missing data when not available.
parameters.name: pad_missing_data

parameters.description: page id for the query. Allowed only for aggregation queries.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: page size of the query. Allowed only for the aggregation queries.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: metrics for a member pool in a virtual service.
parameters.name: pool_uuid

parameters.description: Request prediction values instead of actual observed metrics in future if supported.
parameters.name: prediction

parameters.description: Deprecated. Please do not use this option. APIs only support JSON format. Enum options - METRICS_FORMAT_JSON, METRICS_FORMAT_CSV, METRICS_FORMAT_TXT, METRICS_FORMAT_PROTOBUF.
parameters.name: result_format

parameters.description: Deprecated. Enum options - METRICS_SAMPLING_DEFAULT, METRICS_SAMPLING_FAST, METRICS_SAMPLING_FORCE.
parameters.name: sampling_level

parameters.description: Pool Server ID in format server IP port. Eg. 10.10.1.42 80.
parameters.name: server

parameters.description: UUID of the service engine.Eg. serviceengine_uuid=se-422ce810-50a4-2ecd-d45d-870656e99b7b.
parameters.name: serviceengine_uuid

parameters.description: Start time for the metrics in ISO 8601 format. Default is UNIX Epoch. Eg. start=1970-01-01T00 00 00.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: Metrics time series returned with time points every time duration specified as step. Eg. if bandwidth is desired every 5 Secs then use step=5&metric_id=l4_client.avg_bandwidth.
parameters.name: step

parameters.description: End time for the metrics in ISO 8601 format. Default is now. Eg. stop=2014-01-01T12 42 42.
parameters.name: stop

parameters.description: UUID of the Tenant. .
parameters.name: tenant_uuid

parameters.description: URL filter. Eg. url=http //www.avinetworks.com.
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: Validate every data before returning. This will result in increased latency and should only be used for troubleshooting.
parameters.name: validate_data

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.

parameters.name: start

parameters.name: step

parameters.description: End time for the metrics in ISO 8601 format. Default is now. Eg. stop=2014-01-01T12 42 42.
parameters.name: stop

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller with reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: MetricsQueryResponse Collections API
parameters.name: body

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: Default values are not set.
parameters.name: skip_default

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller with reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: UUID of the object to fetch
parameters.name: uuid

parameters.description: Required if the metrics need to be aggregated across multiple entities like virtualservice.
parameters.name: aggregate_entity

parameters.description: Aggregate metrics for all the records for obj_id. When this is set obj_id is treated as a filter rather than a dimension. Field introduced in 17.2.1.
parameters.name: aggregate_obj_id

parameters.description: Autonomous System number. Eg. asn=3794.
parameters.name: asn

parameters.description: Dos Attack ID filter.
parameters.name: attack

parameters.description: Browser filter. Eg. browser=Chrome.
parameters.name: browser

parameters.description: Client Insights Source Type - Active or Passive. Enum options - NO_INSIGHTS, PASSIVE, ACTIVE.
parameters.name: client_insights

parameters.description: Two letter country filter. Eg. country=US.
parameters.name: country

parameters.description: Detailed header returns metric information, statistics etc. It is has overhead which can be bypassed if caller just wants raw data.
parameters.name: detailed_header

parameters.description: Device type filter. Eg. devtype=desktop.
parameters.name: devtype

parameters.description: Aggregations for dimensions. Eg. use dimenstion_aggregation=avg for averaged metric values. Enum options - METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_NONE, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_AVG, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_SUM, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_MAX, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_MIN, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_PERCENT, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_ALL.
parameters.name: dimension_aggregation

parameters.description: Filters the obj_id based on the filter specified. Enum options - METRICS_FILTER_EQUALS, METRICS_FILTER_LIKE, METRICS_FILTER_CONTAINS, METRICS_FILTER_NOT_EQUALS.
parameters.name: dimension_filter_op

parameters.description: Limit the number of dimensions in the result. specially useful in case of URLs.
parameters.name: dimension_limit

parameters.description: Deprecated. perform sampling for dimensional metrics. zero means auto.
parameters.name: dimension_sampling

parameters.description: Group by dimensions for the metrics. Eg. For results by single dimension use dimensions=browser. For results by browser and operating system use dimensions=browser,os. Enum options - METRICS_DIMENSION_METRIC_TIMESTAMP, METRICS_DIMENSION_COUNTRY, METRICS_DIMENSION_OS, METRICS_DIMENSION_URL, METRICS_DIMENSION_DEVTYPE, METRICS_DIMENSION_LANG, METRICS_DIMENSION_BROWSER, METRICS_DIMENSION_IPGROUP, METRICS_DIMENSION_ATTACK, METRICS_DIMENSION_ASN.
parameters.name: dimensions

parameters.description: UUID of the entity. Eg. entity_uuid=virtualservice-0-1.
parameters.name: entity_uuid

parameters.description: ID of the request. In case of GET API it is returned in the metrics query response. In case of collections API responses are grouped byresponses corresponding to each optimized query.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Resolve UUID to names.
parameters.name: include_refs

parameters.description: Include metrics statistics with the request.
parameters.name: include_statistics

parameters.description: IPGROUP filter Eg. UUID of the IP group.
parameters.name: ipgroup

parameters.description: Language filter. Eg. lang=english.
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Max number of metric samples per metric requestedEg. limit=100 implies return only 100 samples.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Describes the entity type for which metrics is requested. Eg. &metric_entity=VSERVER_METRICS_ENTITY. Enum options - VSERVER_METRICS_ENTITY, VM_METRICS_ENTITY, SE_METRICS_ENTITY, CONTROLLER_METRICS_ENTITY, APPLICATION_METRICS_ENTITY, TENANT_METRICS_ENTITY, POOL_METRICS_ENTITY.
parameters.name: metric_entity

parameters.description: Comma separated list of metrics requested.Eg. metric_id=l4_client.avg_bandwidth,l7_client.avg_total_responses.
parameters.name: metric_id

parameters.description: number of levels of microservices map.
parameters.name: microservice_levels

parameters.description: serverip port of the pool server.
parameters.name: obj_id

parameters.description: Order metrics series by metric timestamp. -metric_timestamp will result in most recent value first in the time series.
parameters.name: order_by

parameters.description: Operating system filter. Eg. os=mac.
parameters.name: os

parameters.description: Pad missing data when not available.
parameters.name: pad_missing_data

parameters.description: page id for the query. Allowed only for aggregation queries.
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: page size of the query. Allowed only for the aggregation queries.
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: metrics for a member pool in a virtual service.
parameters.name: pool_uuid

parameters.description: Request prediction values instead of actual observed metrics in future if supported.
parameters.name: prediction

parameters.description: Deprecated. Please do not use this option. APIs only support JSON format. Enum options - METRICS_FORMAT_JSON, METRICS_FORMAT_CSV, METRICS_FORMAT_TXT, METRICS_FORMAT_PROTOBUF.
parameters.name: result_format

parameters.description: Deprecated. Enum options - METRICS_SAMPLING_DEFAULT, METRICS_SAMPLING_FAST, METRICS_SAMPLING_FORCE.
parameters.name: sampling_level

parameters.description: Pool Server ID in format server IP port. Eg. 10.10.1.42 80.
parameters.name: server

parameters.description: UUID of the service engine.Eg. serviceengine_uuid=se-422ce810-50a4-2ecd-d45d-870656e99b7b.
parameters.name: serviceengine_uuid

parameters.description: Start time for the metrics in ISO 8601 format. Default is UNIX Epoch. Eg. start=1970-01-01T00 00 00.
parameters.name: start

parameters.description: Metrics time series returned with time points every time duration specified as step. Eg. if bandwidth is desired every 5 Secs then use step=5&metric_id=l4_client.avg_bandwidth.
parameters.name: step

parameters.description: End time for the metrics in ISO 8601 format. Default is now. Eg. stop=2014-01-01T12 42 42.
parameters.name: stop

parameters.description: UUID of the Tenant. .
parameters.name: tenant_uuid

parameters.description: URL filter. Eg. url=http //www.avinetworks.com.
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: Validate every data before returning. This will result in increased latency and should only be used for troubleshooting.
parameters.name: validate_data

metrics_sum_agg_invalid.description: Placeholder for description of property metrics_sum_agg_invalid of obj type MetricsDataHeader field type str  type boolean

serviceengine_uuid.description: Service Engine ref or UUID. Field introduced in 17.2.8.

dimension_data.description: Placeholder for description of property dimension_data of obj type MetricsDataHeader field type str  type object

metrics_min_scale.description: Placeholder for description of property metrics_min_scale of obj type MetricsDataHeader field type str  type number

obj_id.description: object ID of the series when object ID was specified in the metric.

priority.description: Placeholder for description of property priority of obj type MetricsDataHeader field type str  type boolean

missing_intervals.description: Missing data intervals. data in these intervals are not used for stats calculation.

units.description: units of the column data. Enum options - METRIC_COUNT, BITS_PER_SECOND, MILLISECONDS, SECONDS, PER_SECOND, BYTES, PERCENT, KILO_BYTES, KILO_BYTES_PER_SECOND, BYTES_PER_SECOND, KILO_BITS_PER_SECOND, GIGA_BYTES, MEGA_BYTES, NORMALIZED, STRING, SEC, MIN, DAYS, KB, MB, GB, MBPS, GHZ, RATIO, WORD, MICROSECONDS, HEALTH, HOURS.

obj_id_type.description: obj_id_type. Enum options - METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_VIRTUALSERVICE, METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_SERVER, METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_POOL, METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_SERVICEENGINE, METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_VIRTUALMACHINE, METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_CONTROLLER, METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_TENANT, METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_CLUSTER, METRICS_OBJ_ID_TYPE_SE_INTERFACE.

series.description: Placeholder for description of property series of obj type MetricsQueryResponse field type str  type object

id.description: returns the ID specified in the query.

metric_entity.description: Enum options - VSERVER_METRICS_ENTITY, VM_METRICS_ENTITY, SE_METRICS_ENTITY, CONTROLLER_METRICS_ENTITY, APPLICATION_METRICS_ENTITY, TENANT_METRICS_ENTITY, POOL_METRICS_ENTITY.

dimension.description: Dimension Type. Enum options - METRICS_DIMENSION_METRIC_TIMESTAMP, METRICS_DIMENSION_COUNTRY, METRICS_DIMENSION_OS, METRICS_DIMENSION_URL, METRICS_DIMENSION_DEVTYPE, METRICS_DIMENSION_LANG, METRICS_DIMENSION_BROWSER, METRICS_DIMENSION_IPGROUP, METRICS_DIMENSION_ATTACK, METRICS_DIMENSION_ASN.

prediction.description: Request prediction values instead of actual observed metrics in future if supported.

pad_missing_data.description: Pad missing data when not available.

client_insights.description: Client Insights Source Type - Active or Passive. Enum options - NO_INSIGHTS, PASSIVE, ACTIVE.

dimension_filter_op.description: Filters the obj_id based on the filter specified. Enum options - METRICS_FILTER_EQUALS, METRICS_FILTER_LIKE, METRICS_FILTER_CONTAINS, METRICS_FILTER_NOT_EQUALS.

detailed_header.description: Detailed header returns metric information, statistics etc. It is has overhead which can be bypassed if caller just wants raw data.

id.description: ID of the request. In case of GET API it is returned in the metrics query response. In case of collections API responses are grouped byresponses corresponding to each optimized query.

metric_entity.description: Describes the entity type for which metrics is requested. Eg. &metric_entity=VSERVER_METRICS_ENTITY. Enum options - VSERVER_METRICS_ENTITY, VM_METRICS_ENTITY, SE_METRICS_ENTITY, CONTROLLER_METRICS_ENTITY, APPLICATION_METRICS_ENTITY, TENANT_METRICS_ENTITY, POOL_METRICS_ENTITY.

order_by.description: Order metrics series by metric timestamp. -metric_timestamp will result in most recent value first in the time series.

dimensions.description: Group by dimensions for the metrics. Eg. For results by single dimension use dimensions=browser. For results by browser and operating system use dimensions=browser,os. Enum options - METRICS_DIMENSION_METRIC_TIMESTAMP, METRICS_DIMENSION_COUNTRY, METRICS_DIMENSION_OS, METRICS_DIMENSION_URL, METRICS_DIMENSION_DEVTYPE, METRICS_DIMENSION_LANG, METRICS_DIMENSION_BROWSER, METRICS_DIMENSION_IPGROUP, METRICS_DIMENSION_ATTACK, METRICS_DIMENSION_ASN.

validate_data.description: Validate every data before returning. This will result in increased latency and should only be used for troubleshooting.

page_size.description: page size of the query. Allowed only for the aggregation queries.

start.description: Start time for the metrics in ISO 8601 format. Default is UNIX Epoch. Eg. start=1970-01-01T00 00 00.

result_format.description: Deprecated. Please do not use this option. APIs only support JSON format. Enum options - METRICS_FORMAT_JSON, METRICS_FORMAT_CSV, METRICS_FORMAT_TXT, METRICS_FORMAT_PROTOBUF.

sampling_level.description: Deprecated. Enum options - METRICS_SAMPLING_DEFAULT, METRICS_SAMPLING_FAST, METRICS_SAMPLING_FORCE.

dimension_limit.description: Limit the number of dimensions in the result. specially useful in case of URLs.

stop.description: End time for the metrics in ISO 8601 format. Default is now. Eg. stop=2014-01-01T12 42 42.

step.description: Metrics time series returned with time points every time duration specified as step. Eg. if bandwidth is desired every 5 Secs then use step=5&metric_id=l4_client.avg_bandwidth.

dimension_aggregation.description: Aggregations for dimensions. Eg. use dimenstion_aggregation=avg for averaged metric values. Enum options - METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_NONE, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_AVG, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_SUM, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_MAX, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_MIN, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_PERCENT, METRICS_DIMENSION_AGG_ALL.

dimension_sampling.description: Deprecated. perform sampling for dimensional metrics. zero means auto.

aggregate_entity.description: Required if the metrics need to be aggregated across multiple entities like virtualservice.

metric_id.description: Comma separated list of metrics requested.Eg. metric_id=l4_client.avg_bandwidth,l7_client.avg_total_responses.

microservice_levels.description: number of levels of microservices map.

obj_id.description: serverip port of the pool server.

country.description: Two letter country filter. Eg. country=US.

page.description: page id for the query. Allowed only for aggregation queries.

server.description: Pool Server ID in format server IP port. Eg. 10.10.1.42 80.

limit.description: Max number of metric samples per metric requestedEg. limit=100 implies return only 100 samples.

aggregate_obj_id.description: Aggregate metrics for all the records for obj_id. When this is set obj_id is treated as a filter rather than a dimension. Field introduced in 17.2.1.

entity_uuid.description: UUID of the entity. Eg. entity_uuid=virtualservice-0-1.

include_statistics.description: Include metrics statistics with the request.

pool_uuid.description: metrics for a member pool in a virtual service.

ipgroup.description: IPGROUP filter Eg. UUID of the IP group.

header.description: Placeholder for description of property header of obj type MetricsDataSeries field type str  type object

data.description: Placeholder for description of property data of obj type MetricsDataSeries field type str  type object

result_has_additional_fields.description: Placeholder for description of property result_has_additional_fields of obj type MetricsDerivationData field type str  type boolean

skip_backend_derivation.description: Placeholder for description of property skip_backend_derivation of obj type MetricsDerivationData field type str  type boolean

join_tables.description: Enum options - METRICS_TABLE_NONE, METRICS_TABLE_ANOMALY, METRICS_TABLE_CONTROLLER_STATS, METRICS_TABLE_HEALTH_SCORE, METRICS_TABLE_SE_STATS, METRICS_TABLE_VSERVER_L4_SERVER, METRICS_TABLE_VSERVER_L4_CLIENT, METRICS_TABLE_VSERVER_L7_CLIENT, METRICS_TABLE_VSERVER_L7_SERVER, METRICS_TABLE_RUM_PREAGG_BROWSER, METRICS_TABLE_RUM_PREAGG_COUNTRY, METRICS_TABLE_RUM_PREAGG_DEVTYPE, METRICS_TABLE_RUM_PREAGG_LANG, METRICS_TABLE_RUM_PREAGG_OS, METRICS_TABLE_RUM_PREAGG_URL, METRICS_TABLE_RUM_ANALYTICS, METRICS_TABLE_VM_STATS, METRICS_TABLE_RESOURCE_TIMING_DIM, METRICS_TABLE_RESOURCE_TIMING_BLOB, METRICS_TABLE_RUM_PREAGG_IPGROUP, METRICS_TABLE_DOS_ANALYTICS, METRICS_TABLE_APP_INSIGHTS, METRICS_TABLE_VSERVER_DNS, METRICS_TABLE_SERVER_DNS, METRICS_TABLE_SERVICE_INSIGHTS, METRICS_TABLE_SOURCE_INSIGHTS, METRICS_TABLE_TENANT_STATS, METRICS_TABLE_SE_IF_STATS, METRICS_TABLE_USER_METRICS, METRICS_TABLE_WAF_GROUP, METRICS_TABLE_WAF_TAG, METRICS_TABLE_WAF_RULE, METRICS_TABLE_PROCESS_STATS, METRICS_TABLE_VSERVER_L7_CLIENT_HTTP2.

exclude_derived_metric.description: Placeholder for description of property exclude_derived_metric of obj type MetricsDerivationData field type str  type boolean

derivation_fn.description: Enum options - METRICS_ALIAS, SUM_FIRST_N_DIVIDE_BY_LAST, SUM_BW_GAUGE, AVG_GET_POST_OTHER_LATENCY, APPDEX_ON_3_BUCKETS, APPDEX_ON_4_BUCKETS, SUM_GAUGE, SUM_N_METRICS, APPDEX_ON_5_BUCKETS, APPDEX_ON_6_BUCKETS, APPDEX_ON_CONNECTIONS, APPDEX_ON_2_BUCKETS, AVG_CLIENT_LATENCY, AVG_APPLICATION_LATENCY, MIN_N_METRICS, SUM_FIRST_N_DIVIDE_BY_LAST_PERCENTAGE, L4_CONNECTION_ERROR_PERCENTAGE, AVG_L4_CLIENT_LATENCY, CHECK_FOR_TRANSITIONS, SUBSTRACT_ALL_FROM_FIRST, AVG_N_OVER_TIME_PERIOD, AVG_NAVIGATION_TIMING, AVG_RUM_VISITS, PCT_SSL_ERROR_CONNECTIONS, AVG_RESPONSE_TIME, SUM_RATES_FIRST_N_DIVIDE_BY_LAST, SUM_RATES_FIRST_N_DIVIDE_BY_LAST_PERCENTAGE, PCT_CACHE_METRICS, SUM_FIRST_N_DIVIDE_BY_SECLAST_EXCL_ERROR_RATE, SUM_FIRST_N_SUBSTRACT_LAST, AVG_POOL_METRICS, AVG_POOL_BW, AVG_BY_SUBSTRACT_ALL_FROM_FIRST_OVER_TIME, AVG_RSA_PFS, EVAL_FN, SSL_PROTOCOL_INDICATOR, SUM_FIRST_N_DIVIDE_BY_SECLAST_RATE_EXCL_ERROR_RATE, SUBSTRACT_ALL_FROM_FIRST_WITH_FLOOR_ZERO, AVAILABLE_CAPACITY, CONNECTION_SATURATION, AVG_RSA_NON_PFS, SSL_HANDSHAKES_NONPFS, DYN_MEM_USAGE, FIRST_DIVIDE_BY_DIFFERENCE_OF_SECOND_AND_THIRD, DIVIDE_BY_100.

include_derivation_metrics.description: Placeholder for description of property include_derivation_metrics of obj type MetricsDerivationData field type str  type boolean

rel_param.description: Placeholder for description of property rel_param of obj type MetricsFilters field type str  type object

op.description: Enum options - EQ, GT, GE, LT, LE, NE.

series.description: list of metrics data series map

browser_rendering_time.description: Placeholder for description of property browser_rendering_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

connection_time.description: Placeholder for description of property connection_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

page_load_time.description: Placeholder for description of property page_load_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

redirection_time.description: Placeholder for description of property redirection_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

dns_lookup_time.description: Placeholder for description of property dns_lookup_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

page_download_time.description: Placeholder for description of property page_download_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

service_time.description: Placeholder for description of property service_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

value.description: Placeholder for description of property value of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

dom_content_load_time.description: Placeholder for description of property dom_content_load_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

server_rtt.description: Placeholder for description of property server_rtt of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

blocking_time.description: Placeholder for description of property blocking_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

prediction_interval_high.description: Placeholder for description of property prediction_interval_high of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

rum_client_data_transfer_time.description: Placeholder for description of property rum_client_data_transfer_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

prediction_interval_low.description: Placeholder for description of property prediction_interval_low of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

waiting_time.description: Placeholder for description of property waiting_time of obj type MetricsData field type str  type number

min.description: minimum value in time series requested.

trend.description: slope of the data points across the time series requested. trend = (last_value - avg)/avg.

max.description: maximum value in time series requested.

num_samples.description: Number of actual data samples. It excludes fake data.
